body_html: I'm afraid that there is little documentation on the internals of TensorFlow. The best way to get started is to read the source code on the parts that you are interested in. It is also unlikely we will have time to extensively document the workings of TensorFlow, as most our documentation effort is aimed at users.

body: I'm afraid that there is little documentation on the internals of TensorFlow. The best way to get started is to read the source code on the parts that you are interested in. It is also unlikely we will have time to extensively document the workings of TensorFlow, as most our documentation effort is aimed at users.
